reviewText: Here you are! TWO VOLUMES READY FOR YOUR VIEWING PLEASURE KEN VENTURI'S ENCYCLOPEDIA OF GOLF volume 2(The Long Game) KEN VENTURI'S ENCYCLOPEDIA OF GOLF volume 3(The Short Game) One all-time greats of the professional golf tour, Venturi has left his mark on the game as a player, television commentator, and instructor. His Stroke Savers tips are a regular feature on nationally tlevised Tournaments.
